observation: Investment Management and Stockbroking - Redmayne Bentley  Share search Client login Menu Careers Intermediaries Media Centre Investment Management Stockbroking Location Finder Search for your local office Submit Share Prices & Company Research Our Services Financial Planning Managed Portfolios Investing for Retirement Our Approach Our Investment Process Our Investment Approach Our Fees Are you looking for peace of mind in retirement? You could look to mitigate inheritance tax (IHT) by investing in a portfolio of qualifying shares traded on the Alternative Investment Market (AIM). Find out more Open a portfolio and start trading Transfer to us from another provider Talk to a Stockbroker Take control over your investment decisions. View our range of stock market publications and newsletters. View our Publications New Issues Latest News ISAs Pensions About Us Login Home Personal investment expertise since 1875 READ OUR LATEST UPDATE Award success at the COLWMA Redmayne Bentley’s Discretionary investment management services have been recognised with key awards in both the individual and company award categories at the City of London Wealth Management Awards. Award Success at IC Event Redmayne Bentley has received the award for Best Wealth Manager for Tax Services at the Investors’ Chronicle Previous Next What our clients say "When I was working, I had some shares with Redmayne Bentley but chose another company when I retired. However, I decided to come back to you. I try and understand the markets, but it is hard to find the skill and knowledge that investment managers have. I take the attitude that you’re the experts. Our investment manager takes a great deal of trouble to give a good service. I always find it interesting to receive the investment reports. Overall, we’re very happy.” 28 August 2018, Mr W, Keighley (Discretionary Managed Service client) "Firstly I'd like to thank Redmayne Bentley for being so helpful and supportive in transferring my inheritance shares - I don't know what I would have done had yourselves not been involved, thank you so much. I am delighted in how Redmayne Bentley have handled all aspects of my portfolio and I appreciate everything all Redmayne Bentley staff have done to help and assist me." 31 March 2022, Ms A, Grampian (Execution-Only Stockbroking Client) Our Net Promoter Score is a measure of clients likely to recommend Redmayne Bentley. As at 1st July 2022, out of 7,199 client responses our score is currently 72.1%. Please remember that investments can fall in value Get in touch today 0113 243 6941 Or your local office can advise you on our services Important Terms of Use Privacy Policy Terms of Business HELP Brochures and Forms Make a Payment Frequently Asked Questions INFORMATION Our Service Levels Treating Customers Fairly Protection of Client Assets Investors In People (IIP) Gender Pay Gap Report Follow Us Website © Redmayne Bentley 2024 The value of your investments and the income from them may go down as well as up, and you could get back less than you invested.
